infos.info: By Dunning: - ' April 30, 1930, KNX, Los Angeles, began radio's coverage of the event ... CBS gave partial coverage in 1942 and 1943. By 1944 the event was on KFWB, with a shortwave hookup around the world. ... March 15, 1945, the affair went on the Blue Network. ... Radio dropped it after the 1968 awards.'

prints.title: RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York
On the Air : The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio
prints.author: Dunning, John
